allow:
Bash(zsh -c 'source ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc && echo ""=== Testing aliases ==="" && alias | grep -E ""^(g|lg|vi|k)="" | head -5 && echo -e ""
=== Testing environment ==="" && echo ""EDITOR=$EDITOR"" && echo ""XDG_CONFIG_HOME=$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"" && echo -e ""
=== Testing tools ==="" && command -v zoxide && command -v starship && echo -e ""
=== Shell loaded successfully ==="" ')

Bash(zsh -c 'source ~/.config/zsh/.zshrc 2>&1 && echo ""=== Testing aliases ==="" && alias | grep -E ""^(g|lg|vi|ls|cat)="" | head -6 && echo -e ""
=== Testing environment ==="" && echo ""EDITOR=$EDITOR"" && echo ""HISTSIZE=$HISTSIZE"" && echo -e ""
=== Testing tools ==="" && command -v zoxide >/dev/null && echo ""✓ zoxide"" && command -v starship >/dev/null && echo ""✓ starship"" && echo -e ""
=== Testing NVM lazy-load ==="" && type nvm | head -1 && echo -e ""
=== Shell loaded successfully ==="" ')
